scripts.fix: yarn run prettierfix && yarn run eslint --fix && yarn run stylelint --fix
scripts.fix2: yarn run prettier && yarn run eslint --fix && yarn run stylelint --fix
scripts.prettier: prettier --loglevel warn src/**/*.js src/**/*.vue src/**/*.scss static/*.css static/**/*.css
scripts.prettierfix: prettier --loglevel warn --write src/**/*.js src/**/*.vue src/**/*.scss static/*.css static/**/*.css
